text: Lorenzo Girolamo Mattei (29 May 1748, Rome - 24 July 1833) was an Italian cardinal from the house of Mattei. He was promoted to cardinal by pope Gregory XVI in the consistory of 15 April 1833. He was also nominal Latin Patriarch of Antioch. ==References== Category:1748 births Category:1833 deaths Category:People from Rome Category:Italian cardinals L Category:Latin Patriarchs of Antioch Category:Cardinals created by Pope Gregory XVI
title: Lorenzo Girolamo Mattei
